alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 10:07PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Diego County through 1045 PM PDT... At 1006 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lakeside, or 7 miles south of Ramona, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poway, Ramona, Alpine, Tierrasanta, Escondido, Santee, Scripps Ranch, San Diego Country Estates, Lakeside, San Pasqual, Hwy 78 Between Ramona And Santa Ysabel, Lake Murray, Rancho Encantada, Winter Gardens, Flinn Springs, Barona Indian Reservation, Harbison Canyon, Captain Grande Indian Reservation, Highland Valley and Santa Ysabel Indian Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
